explains: n. 鸡；鸡肉；<非正式>胆小鬼，懦夫；（儿童玩的）比试胆量的游戏
v. <非正式>因害怕而放弃，胆怯（chicken out）

sentences.en: The chicken was only half cooked.
Andrew began to carve the chicken.
